name: ba2extract
description: A command-line tool to extract the contents of ba2 files.

name: BA2 Explorer
description: Tool to explore BA2 archives.

name: BA2Lib
description: A .NET CLI/C++ Wrapper around a C++ class for opening and extracting files from Bethesda's BA2 archive format.

name: BA2 Tools
description: Provides managed access to BA2 archives.

name: Bethesda Archive Extractor (BAE)
description: Extractor for BSA, BA2, and other archives for Bethesda games since Oblivion.

name: BSA#
description: A managed implementation of the BSA format that allows for efficient in-memory reading, writing, and manipulation of Bethesda Archives.

name: BSA Browser
description: Fallout Mod Manager's BSA Browser as a standalone application, with some new features.

name: BSA Commander
description: Work with oblivion archive files (.bsa) with friendly interface.

name: BSA Extractor
description: Extractor of files for TES 3,4,5 and Fallout 3.

name: BSA Manager
description: Manager program for the Bethesda Softworks Archives (BSA). Made by ousnius.

name: BSA Manager
description: This project allows you to open the media files (*.bsa) for the Bethesda games Oblivion, Fallout 3 and Skyrim. Made by philjord.

name: BSAOpt
description: A tool which manages and recompresses BSA-files. It has been forked off NIFopt and both programs share the same underlying technology regarding BSAs. Both programs treat BSAs exactly like directories, files inside can be adressed easily.

name: BSA Tool
description: Tool to edit various files in TES1: Arena.

name: BSA Unpacker
description: BSA (Bethesda Softworks Archive) Unpacker.

name: BSA Unpacker
description: The Oblivion Mod Manager's BSA unpacker.

name: bsaunpak
description: Command line tool for extracting Skyrim BSA files.

name: cpp-bsa
description: Library for parsing Morrowind BSA files.

name: FO3 Archive Utility
description: A BSA archive utility for Fallout 3. You can display the files in an archive, extract all files from the archive, extract selected files/directories from the archive, and create a new archive.

name: libbsa
description: A free software library for reading BSA files.

name: bsatk
description: Library to deal with BSA files.

name: unbsa4
description: The Elder Scrolls 4 - Oblivion BSA archive unpacker.

name: Bethesda
description: Various libraries that can marshal/unmarshal files associated with Bethesda Game Studios games.

name: CBash
description: CBash fork with partial Skyrim support.

name: esptools
description: Tools for Bethesda games mod file formats.

name: libespm
description: A free software library for reading Elder Scrolls Plugin (.ESP) and Elder Scrolls Master (.ESM) files. Libespm focuses on providing a useful API to libloadorder and LOOT, rather than a general-purpose plugin parser.

name: mod-dump
description: A command line application to produce compatibility dumps on bethesda plugins built on top of the xEdit codebase.

name: php-esmparser
description: Very low level ESM/ESP parser.

name: SkyProc
description: A Java library that offers easy to use Java API for importing, manipulating, and exporting mods.

name: BOSS
description: An automated plugin load order sorting tool for TES IV: Oblivion.

name: LOOT - Load Order Optimisation Tool
description: A plugin load order optimisation tool for Morrowind, Oblivion, Skyrim, Fallout 3, Fallout: New Vegas and Fallout 4.

name: Mod Conflict Detector
description: A stand alone version of the conflict detector used by oblivion mod manager.

name: Mod Organizer (MO)
description: A tool for managing mod collections of arbitrary size. It is specifically designed for people who like to experiment with mods and thus need an easy and reliable way to install and uninstall them.

name: Mod Organizer 2 (MO2)
description: A tool for managing mod collections of arbitrary size. It is specifically designed for people who like to experiment with mods and thus need an easy and reliable way to install and uninstall them. Mod Organizer 2 is a mod manager created by Tannin to support 64-bit games like Skyrim Special Edition and Fallout 4 in addition to all the 32-bit games MO1 already supported.

name: Multiple Oblivion Manager (MOM)
description: A new take on managing multiple Oblivion installs. It's a small app with a powerful punch that will ease the confusion of trying to manually switch between two or more Oblivion setups.

name: Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
description: A free and open source piece of software that allows you to download, install, update and manage your files through an easy to use interface. It integrates with the Nexus sites to provide you with a fast, efficient and much less hassled modding experience.

name: Oblivion Mod Manager
description: A utility for managing plugins, and also for packing them for distribution. It can be used either as an enhanced version of the oblivion launcher's data files selector, or as a more advanced mod manager when mods are specially packed into omod files.

name: smash
description: An application that provides a means of performing automatic conflict resolution between multiple Bethesda Plugin Files for Skyrim, Oblivion, Fallout 3, and Fallout New Vegas.

name: Wrye Bash
description: A mod management utility for Oblivion, Skyrim, Skyrim Special Edition and Fallout 4 with a rich set of features.

name: FalloutSnip
description: A fork of the TESVSnip which was itself a fork of the TESsnip utility bundled with Fallout Mod Manager with changes specifically for Fallout 4.

name: Merge Plugins
description: A tool for combining mods from Bethesda games which have .ESP/.ESM files.

name: SkyEdit
description: An alternate editor for The Elder Scrolls: Skyrim, similar to the official "Creation Kit".

name: xEdit
description: xEdit (TES5Edit, TES4Edit, FO3Edit, FNVEdit, FO4Edit, SSEEdit) is an advanced graphical .ESP and .ESM file editor and conflict detector.

name: xEdit Pro
description: xEdit by Elminster; forked by @fireundubh; fixes and enhancements for scripters and advanced users.

name: TES4LODGen
description: Allows you to generate Objects LOD for worldspace(s) by scanning all mods in load order that add visible from distant objects.

name: TES5LODGen
description: Allows you to generate Objects LOD for worldspace(s) by scanning all mods in load order that add visible from distant objects.

name: SSELODGen
description: Allows you to generate Objects LOD for worldspace(s) by scanning all mods in load order that add visible from distant objects.

name: FO3LODGen
description: Allows you to generate Objects LOD for worldspace(s) by scanning all mods in load order that add visible from distant objects.

name: FNVLODGen
description: Allows you to generate Objects LOD for worldspace(s) by scanning all mods in load order that add visible from distant objects.

name: TES3Edit
description: Adaptation of xEdit for Morrowind.

name: TES5EditScripts
description: A collection of TES5Edit/FNVEdit scripts for modders.

name: xEditScripts
description: A collection of xEdit scripts for experienced xEdit users.

name: xedit-scripts
description: This is a repository of fireundubh's "released" scripts for xEdit.

name: TESVESSE
description: TESV save game editor.

name: TESVSnip
description: Skyrim fork of the Fallout Mod Manager TESsnip dialog.

name: Unfuzer
description: A utility that does mass extracting/inserting of xwm files from/into voice files (.fuz), with automatic xWMA <-> PCM transcoding.

name: XWM Ninja
description: A tool that converts between xWMA (*.xwm) and a variety of other formats.

name: DDSOpt
description: A tool which manages and recompressed DDS-files. It has been forked off NIFopt and both programm share the same underlying technology regarding DDSs and BSAs.

name: hkxcmd
description: Enables converting Havok animation from the Skyrim-compatible binary format to the Havok XML format or to the Gamebryo KF animation format.

name: NIFopt
description: Optimizing NIF models and more.

name: NifSkope
description: A tool for opening and editing the NetImmerse file format (NIF). NIF is used by video games such as Morrowind, Oblivion, Skyrim, Fallout 3, Fallout: New Vegas, Civilization IV, and more.

name: Blender NIF Plugin
description: A Blender addon to enable import and export of the .NIF File Format.

name: Python File Format Interface (PyFFI)
description: A Python library for processing block structured files.

name: Mopper
description: Tool for creating havok mopp code.

name: 3DS Max NIF Plugin
description: The NIF plugin for 3DS Max.

name: Maya NIF Plugin
description: The NIF plugin for Maya.

name: Niflib
description: A C++ library for reading and writing NIF files.

name: NifUtilsSuite
description: Collection of NifUtils within one App.

name: BOSS Userlist Manager
description: Helps you manage your mod load order for Skyrim, Oblivion, Nehrim, Fallout3 and FalloutNV. It uses BOSS Userlist rules to customise the order in which mods should be loaded and allows you to specify the load order for unknown mods without editing the BOSS Masterlist.

name: Dynamic Distant Objects LOD (DynDOLOD)
description: A set of tools based on TES5Edit and TES5LODGen to automatically create a Skyrim mod based on the load order which adds distant LOD for objects to Skyrim.

name: ENB Helper
description: Provides extended Skyrim engine features for ENBSeries.

name: Fallout Performance Monitor
description: A utility used for tracking Fallout 4’s system resource usage as they relate to the game engine, your system hardware, and installed mods.

name: lltool
description: Provides several methods and algorithms for heightmap manipulation and terrain triangulation.

name: Multi Purpose GUI (MPGUI)
description: Aims to be a graphical frontend for various command-line based tools such as Lightwaves TESAnnwyn or TES4qLOD.

name: Landscape LOD Generator
description: This tool creates LOD meshes, color and normal maps based on landscape heightmaps as generated by ESP/ESM files. Therefore, it can be used to replace the meshes of Oblivion/FalloutNV (Fallout3 is under preparation) including all the additional changes added by landscape and texture mods.

name: NMM Script Checker
description: Validates C# installer scripts for Nexus Mod Manager for being valid.

name: Oblivion Face Exchange Lite
description: With this tool, you can change your character's name, hairstyle, hair length, hair color, eyes and copy face from a another save file, from a face file, from text that is copied to the clipboard or from a non-player character.

name: Save Game Script Cleaner
description: This tool can remove selected Papyrus scripts from a save game file.

name: SkyBoost
description: Boosts Skyrim via replacing most bottleneck code parts in the executable at runtime.

name: Skyrim Performance Monitor
description: A utility used for tracking Skyrim’s system resource usage as it relates to INI settings and installed mods.

name: Skyrim Performance Monitor 64
description: The Skyrim Performance Monitor is a utility used for tracking Skyrims Memory, VRAM, Disk I/O, CPU, GPU, GPU Temperature, and Threads system resource usage, and also FPS as they relate to INI settings and installed mods.

name: StrEdit
description: A minimalistic editor of the string table files that TES V: Skyrim plugins use to provide support for multiple languages. StrEdit can be used to create or update translations of string tables, without requiring their associated plugin to be present.

name: TES4Files
description: A tool that packages a mod for you, all you do is tell it what ESM/ESP file to package and poof all the files are copied into a subdirectory suitable for zipping or compressing and sending off.

name: TES4Gecko
description: Works with The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion plugin and master files (*.ESP/*.ESM). It is designed to let mod-creators manipulate plugin and master files in ways that Bethesda either did not imagine or decided to leave out of the official Construction Set.

name: TES Char Tracker
description: Draws your Skyrim/Fallout 4 character movement map.

name: TESDumpStats
description: Dump very basic statistics about ES plugins (record counts, subrecord counts, etc).

name: The OBSE Launcher
description: A program to help launching oblivion with or without OBSE.

name: cpp-reorder
description: A program for reordering mods.

name: ES Search
description: A search engine for Morrowind and Oblivion modifcations.

name: Fores New Idles in Skyrim (FNIS)
description: Allows other mods to add different types of animations to the Skyrim: idles/poses; sequenced, arm offset, furniture, and paired animations, killmoves, creature animations, and others.

name: libloadorder
description: A free software library for manipulating the load order and active status of plugins for TES III: Morrowind, TES IV: Oblivion, TES V: Skyrim, Fallout 3, Fallout: New Vegas and Fallout 4.

name: libstrings
description: A free software library for reading and writing TES V: Skyrim's .STRINGS, .DLSTRINGS and .ILSTRINGS files.

name: MoreHeap
description: Allows the user to increase the size of the initially allocated memory block, possibly increasing stability in the process.

name: Oscape
description: Generates all resources for Oblivion's & Skyrim's LOD: color-maps, normal-maps and meshes at any resolution.

name: spttools
description: SpeedTreeRT SPT file converter for text editing.

name: Caprica
description: A compiler for the Papyrus scripting language used by the Creation Engine.

name: Champollion for Skyrim
description: A PEX to Papyrus Decompiler for Skyrim.

name: Champollion for Fallout 4
description: A PEX to Papyrus Decompiler for Fallout 4.

name: scriptdump
description: A command-line tool to disassemble pex files.

name: Papyrus Log Viewer
description: Papyrus logs can become very large and be cluttered with countless duplicates of each warning or error. This simple log viewer will only show each entry once, making it easier to get an overview and less likely to miss less common entries among all the duplicates.

name: Fallout Script Extender (FOSE)
description: The Fallout Script Extender, or FOSE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Fallout 3. It does so without modifying the Fallout3.exe or the G.E.C.K. files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.

name: Fallout 4 Script Extender (F4SE)
description: The Fallout 4 Script Extender, or F4SE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Fallout 4. It does so without modifying the Fallout4.exe or the G.E.C.K. files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.

name: Four Dragon
description: Four Dragon is the custom script engine for Fallout 4 which allows to use Papyrus script events and functions in 3rd party plugins written in any .NET language (C#, VB). User written plugins can be located in plain source files (*.cs/*.vb) or in compiled libraries (*.dll).

name: New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE)
description: The New Vegas Script Extender, or NVSE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Fallout: NV. It does so without modifying the executable files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.

name: Oblivion Script Extender (OBSE)
description: The Oblivion Script Extender, or OBSE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of TES IV: Oblivion. It does so without modifying the executable files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.

name: Script Dragon
description: ScriptDragon is Skyrim engine extender, which allows to use Skyrim Papyrus script functions in 3rd party ScriptDragon plugins.

name: Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
description: The Skyrim Script Extender, or SKSE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of TES V: Skyrim. It does so without modifying the executable files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.

name: ConScribe
description: A plugin for the Oblivion Script Extender that logs console messages and adds textual I/O commands.

name: Construction Set Extender
description: A plugin for the Oblivion Script Extender that overhauls and fixes the TES 4 Oblivion Construction Set.

name: Better Cities Helper
description: A plugin for the Oblivion Script Extender that helps out the Better Cities mod by punching the daylights out of certain stubborn references.

name: Blockhead
description: A plugin for the Oblivion Script Extender that adds support for gender variant head meshes/textures (among other pointless things) by applying excessive verbal pressure on the engine.

name: INIzer
description: A plugin for the Oblivion Script Extender that allows multiple game installations use different sets of active plugins and INI settings.

name: NifSE
description: NifSE is a modder's resource, an OBSE plugin that brings the functionality of the NifTools team's incredible Niflib to Oblivion scripters. NifSE allows scripters to read and modify NIF files during the game through scripts, and does so without changing any files on your harddrive or writing any permanent data to the disk!

name: Oblivion Graphics Extender v2
description: An OBSE plug-in that will increase the eye candy in the game Oblivion.

name: Oblivion Graphics Extender (OBGE) v3
description: An OBSE plugin that adds extra functionality to Oblivion's scripting language, focussed on the implementation and manipulation of graphics effects. It adds support for fullscreen shaders and extra HUD elements, provides information about graphics memory and screen resolution and allows you to clear some of oblivions textures from graphics memory.

name: Oblivion Reloaded
description: Oblivion Reloaded mainly modifies the rendering pipeline, adding new features and providing screen effects not supported in vanilla Oblivion. This project begins where Oblivion Graphics Extender (OBGE) left off, implementing a series of new features and removing limitations that no longer make sense. OR is the new OBGE version, but it has been re-written to go over the OBGE limitations, removing also the retro compatibility.

name: Runtime Debugger
description: A plugin for the Oblivion Script Extender that adds a full-scale script debugger for the game's runtime.

name: RuntimeEditorIDs
description: A plugin for the Oblivion Script Extender that allocates editorIDs for forms during runtime.

name: Runtime Script Profiler
description: A plugin for the Oblivion Script Extender that profiles script execution during runtime.

name: shadeMe
description: An OBSE plugin that adds dynamic shadows to all entities in Tamriel.

name: Trifle
description: An omnibus OBSE plugin.

name: Universal Silent Voice
description: This OBSE plugin makes Oblivion play a 8 seconds duration silent voice for any missing voice files and use generic lips movements for 8 seconds for any missing lip synchronization files.

name: ConSkrybe
description: A plugin for the Skyrim Script Extender that attaches itself to the in-game console's brainstem (not unlike a mutant Babel fish) and illicitly siphons any and all I/O it handles.

name: Creation Kit Extender
description: A plugin for the Skyrim Script Extender that does to the Creation Kit what the Construction Set Extender did to the Construction Set.

name: Fuz Ro D-oh
description: A plugin for the Skyrim Script Extender that adds support for unvoiced in-game dialog.

name: JContainers
description: JSON-based data structures for Papyrus.

name: Memory Blocks Log
description: A SKSE plugin that writes the sizes of the two memory blocks DefaultHeap and ScrapHeap to a logfile whenever more memory is committed to them.

name: NetImmerse Override
description: Allows overriding of Armor shader properties that are active on particular Actors. Also allows overriding properties of specific node names (Advanced use only). All modifications are saved to the SKSE co-save and do not need to be re-applied on reload. All armor modifications are re-applied automatically when re-equipped.

name: Nitpick
description: Removes the 255-character limit placed on string values in Skyrim’s INI files, and fixes the bug that prevented active mod files from loading at start-up if there were more than 508 ESP/ESM files in the Data directory.

name: PapyrusUtil
description: allows you to save any amount of int, float, form and string values on any form or globally from papyrus scripts. Also supports lists of those data types. These values can be accessed from any mod allowing easy dynamic compatibility.

name: SKSE -Elys- Alt F4
description: Allows pressing Alt+F4 keys to close the game.

name: Skyrim -Elys- MemInfo
description: This plugin will display Memory Usage and Frames per Second information on the top right corner of your screen.

name: Smart Souls
description: A plugin for the Skyrim Script Extender that modifies how the Soul Trap magic effect behaves.

name: Elder Scrolls Explorer
description: Pure java project for wandering around in the TES games Morrowind, Oblivion, Fallout3, FalloutNV, Skyrim, Fallout 4.

name: Fallout 4 Ultimate Tweak Tool
description: A program to help tweak Fallout 4 .ini settings with a GUI instead of a user editing the .ini files.

name: Fallout 4 Configuration Tool
description: Another program to change Fallout 4 .ini settings with a GUI.

name: SublimePapyrus
description: A Sublime Text 2 and 3 package for the Papyrus scripting language.

name: Advanced Papyrus
description: A wrapper program that allows for more advanced use of the Papyrus compiler from within Creation Kit.

name: Unforbidable Patcher
description: A tool that allows automatic creation of plugin files for games The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout 4 according to predefined rules provided by the user or a third party.

name: PapyrusDotNet
description: A papyrus compiler that compiles .NET binaries into papyrus binaries.

name: MCM Designer
description: An application that generates papyrus scripts for MCM menus.

name: xedit-tesv-scripts
description: A package of scripts for TES5Edit that modify Papyrus-related data bound to forms in your mod.

name: Rotation Library
description: A rotation library that makes it easier to work with rotation math in Skyrim. Among other things, it can position and rotate one object relative to another for you.

name: Skyrim DDS Image Viewer
description: A utility used for viewing the .dds texture files and displaying the details of the DDS image pixel dimensions and file sizes in an orderable list.

name: Ini File Editor
description: An advanced config file editor for making updates/tweaks to ini files for games like Skyrim, Fallout 3, Fallout New Vegas, and Oblivion.

name: Nexus Mod Monitor
description: A utility which allows mod authors to track user activity of their mods.

name: TESVTranslator
description: An advanced editor for translate mod built with automatic translation logic in mind, and allows easy translation updates.

name: Fallout4Translator
description: An advanced editor for translate mod built with automatic translation logic in mind, and allows easy translation updates.

name: PapyrusED
description: A script-editor for Papyrus.

name: BodySlide and Outfit Studio
description: BodySlide and Outfit Studio, a tool to convert, create, and customize outfits and bodies for Bethesda games.

name: Mfg Console
description: This mod resurrects "mfg phoneme/modifier" console command and playerBlink at Skyrim ver.1.9.32 again, and adds some information window, some commands and customizable command-alias to the console.

name: Lilac
description: A Papyrus unit test framework for Skyrim and Fallout 4.

name: SkyrimTools
description: ReSaver is a new savegame editor, based loosely on the excellent user interface of SaveTool. ReStringer can analyze a mod or group of mods, and rewrite their scripts so that they use fewer strings.

name: FOMOD Validator
description: This little app allows you validate and check for common errors in your FOMOD installers. Simply place the path to your package (the source files) and press Ok and, according to your selections, it will provide with your results. Simple, easy and effective.

name: FOMOD Documentation
description: Documentation for the fomod installer format.

name: SteelSeries GameSense Plugin - Fallout 4
description: This is a plugin that allows SteelSeries users to use GameSense with Fallout 4.

name: Player Stats API - Fallout 4
description: This is a plugin that retrieves player stats from Fallout 4 during runtime and provides exported functions that return those values.

name: pipboylib
description: Companion pip boy library for Fallout 4.

name: pipboycli
description: A blessed cli for your Fallout 4 PipBoy.

name: Pipboy Beacon
description: Remote beacon for sharing your pipboy data.

name: Pipboy Desktop
description: Experimental pipboy Desktop app for Fallout 4.

name: pipboyrelay
description: Relay for the pipboy app for Fallout 4.

name: xedit-lib
description: DLL Wrapper for the xEdit framework.

name: Mod Analyzer
description: Analyzes mod archives to produce a report in JSON format which includes archive metadata, fomod/bain options, asset file paths (including inside BSAs), and plugin dumps produced by ModDump.

name: SkyNet
description: A free, open-source multiplayer mod for Bethesda's Skyrim.

name: Skyrim Online
description: A multiplayer mod for Bethesda's Skyrim.

name: Autoload
description: Autoload allows you to bypass the main menu and open-to-game with no additional clicks required.

name: esxdump
description: Create diff reports for data file plugins.

name: zEdit
description: zEdit is a new GUI and API for the xEdit framework.  It includes a plugin editor with conflict detection, an extension system, and a patching framework.

name: AFKPexAnon
description: Anonymize's Bethesda's compiled Papyrus script files (.pex) by masking the computer and user names that get stored.

name: SSE NIF Optimizer
description: A tool for mod authors that optimizes your SK NIF files for the (actual) new SSE format and fixes issues.

name: TesModManager
description: TesModManager is a new version of OBMM Extended that supports Skyrim SE, Skyrim, Oblivion and Morrowind.

name: LSLib
description: Tools for manipulating Divinity Original Sin files. Includes OSI editor and GR2 converter.

name: Cathedral Assets Optimizer
description: A tool aiming to automate asset conversion and optimization for Skyrim Special Edition.

name: Voice File Reference Tool 2 (VFRT2)
description: Easy access to dialogue (text & audio) in Skyrim SE and Fallout 4, searchable through a simple interface.

name: Voice File Reference Tool (VFRT)
description: Allows the user to easily find the name of the voice file for any line of dialogue in Skyrim / LE.

name: Fuz Ro D-oh 64 for Skyrim SE
description: A plugin for the Skyrim Script Extender that adds support for unvoiced in-game dialog in Skyrim SE.

name: F4z Ro D-oh for Fallout 4
description: A plugin for the F4SE that adds support for unvoiced in-game dialog in Fallout 4.

name: ENB Helper SE
description: Adds necessary functions to support extra features in ENB for Skyrim Special Edition.

name: JContainers SE
description: JSON-based data structures for Papyrus (SE Port).

name: Fores New Idles in Skyrim SE (FNIS SE)
description: Allows other mods to add different types of animations to the Skyrim SE: idles/poses; sequenced, arm offset, furniture, and paired animations, killmoves, creature animations, and others.
